name: Locker Token
description: The LOCKER (Room) is a Web3 ecosystem designed for professional sports teams, players and fans to connect in the new digital world. We offer a full suite of blockchain services, including whitelabel app development, consulting and integration assistances, helping our clients position themselves at the forefront of upcoming digital trends. With the rise of crypto mainstream adoption, opportunities have arisen for professional sports teams to capitalize on their modern fan base and change the game, awhile giving fans the ability to connect with their favourite teams & players like never before.
